document_data.name: Marsalas Endrivin
document_data.mainbody: '''Marsalas Endrivin''' was a [[stormlord]] of [[Talos]] at the deity's only sanctioned temple, located at the base of the semi-active volcano [[Mount Ugruth]], around [[1370 DR]]. His realm of influence, which he referred to as the "Stormlands", included the city of [[Hlondeth]] and the lands between the [[Aphrunn Mountains|Aphrunn]] and the [[Orsraun Mountains]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Personality: Stormlord Endrivin was known for his ruthless and vindictive personality.
document_data.Possessions: Being well-equipped for protection, Endrivin was known for wearing ''[[bracers of defense]]'' and a ''+3 [[ring of protection]]''. His preferred weapons of choice were a ''+2 [[morningstar]]'' or similarly [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[javelin]]s.
